review: Such an amazing place! We have visited this restaurant multiple times and every visit was amazing! Kisho and his family are so sweet and hospitable and really made us feel at home. The food is really amazing and will be freshly made for you with...so much love. Definately check this place out yourselves, you will not regret  so much love. Definately check this place out yourselves, you will not regret it!

By far the best restaurant in Sri Lanka we‚Äòve been to! Definitely a must...try if you‚Äôre in Trincomal try if you‚Äôre in Trincomalee!

Best restaurant in trincomalee if not all of Sri Lanka. Fresh fish and seafood and incredibly delicious curries. The restaurant is run by the warmest people we had the pleasure to meet in Sri Lanka. We will be back again!

They people are very nicr and friendly

Very good sea food restaurant, we had the best tuna and shrimps. Friendly family who work hard to please the customers in the best way.

Food here was great, and very cheap for the area. My boyfriend tried the crab curry as well as the prawn curry, and really enjoyed both of them - the crab curry was his favorite meal of our whole trip. Since i am vegan i...had the vegetable curry, and it was also very good, both the one with rice and the one with roti(they had more vegan options as well). The family who runs the place is super nice. The second time we came here it was super late and we were just walking around trying to find any place that was open. We asked the woman if they were closed(cause the place was empty) and she said yes but then she called for her husband, the chef, who was upstairs. He came down and they said we could sit down! They stayed open just to make us food! A little restaurant but the best food.It was simply delicious and the owners are incredibly kind! I highly recommand this place+++

My favourite restaurant in trinco !! Loving family full of happiness and will do anything for you :)

Family run restaurant with delicious food. They do their own style of grilled whole fish, which we just loved. Can easly recommend this place and will definetly come back!

Amazing place.  Its run by a local family and they are so kind and loving. The food was even better and for an affordable price. I even went there 3 times in 1 week. The fresh fish is tasty and they make their own unique...sauce to top this  sauce to top this off

I really loved it here, it was very peaceful and the rotti and pancakes were amazing!  Family run restaurant, the kids are adorable and the lovely lady who welcomes and serves you is very friendly and welcoming.  Great prices too!
Really good restaurant where you can find excellent srilankan food. The staff is nice and kind. We‚Äôve been there two times in two days. Highly recommended!
Good food and good evening atmosphere. Out of season so menu was slightly more limited but still good

Weve eaten here 3 times and got take aways, the Veggie Kothu is delicious and only 800/¬£2 and a huge portion.

We were only in this area for one day but man, am I glad we found this place! Only 200 metres from our room, service was great, but it was all about the prawn curry for two! We came here for dinner on quite a few nights. We loved having lunch or dinner there.
Especially the vegetarian rice and curry buffet was crazy good. We paid around 4 euros to try 8 different types of curries. You should definitely go there! üòä

We ate here the other night and had the crab curry. The flavor was excellent and the service was spot on. Without doubt the best crab curry I have ever had. If I could leave a 10 star review I would .

My husband and l both had the vegetarian buffet ( and he is a meat eater ) The buffet starts at 6 pm so you can be assured it so fresh and hot and served from clay pots . The food is delicious with just...the right balance of spices and herbs. There are about 7 different curries to choose from and of course always rice and poppodams. Every night there are different choices. 1300 rupee , unbelievable value for the most delicious, tasty meal . The staff are always welcoming and friendly, special mention to Shoban and Sugadhuni 10 the right balance of spices and herbs. Delicious food & juices. Best meal we‚Äôve had in Sri Lanka and we‚Äôve been here 3 weeks.
Highly recommend one of the couple‚Äôs curries, excellent value!

Mostly recommend the fish grilled and all kind of grilled. Very kind staffes and they make me happy and amazing cocktails are here mostly cubalibre 
Most favorite restaurant in trincomalee

Great family cooking. Went two nights in a row. Had the chicken curry the first night and vegetable buffet the second night. The veggie dishes changed the second night and were great.
Highly recommend.
Staff were friendly and gave us a great night out.

We stayed in  TRINCOMALEE for 2 nights.

Sri Lanka's tourist industry is still struggling to recover from the pandemic and we try, wherever possible to eat in local restaurants. 

RICE & CURRY was an absolute treat.

So enjoyable we went back the next nights.

We...were a large group of 15 and while this was a challenge, the chef delivered what we feel was the best local cuisine we have experienced.

The restaurant offers 6-7 vegetable dishes as a bistro style offering (don't be fooled, these are beautifully cooked flavoured dishes). We also had the chicken kothhu.

There are many curry dishes on offer.

Food was affordable and full of regional flavours.

We loved our 2 visits to Rice & Curry!

A great location with local cuisine, 
large portions at reasonable prices. 

A must visit in Trincomalee, the best rice and curry (especially the cauliflower) we have eaten on our trip.
One of the best rice and curry we eat in Sri Lanka in clay pot!!!!And also French fries they have for the kids or if you

What a delicious meal. We had crab one evening and the catch of the day one evening. We were asked if ginger and garlic were okay and yes it was. It was the best sauce we have ever tasted. Unfortunately, I can't eat spicy food,...but this was cooked especially for me without chili. It was a dream in every thing. The fish was tender and just perfect. The saut√©ed vegetables were incredibly flavorful. We are happy and can only recommend Ubay Seafo but this was cooked especially for me without chili. It was a dream in every thing. The fish was tender and just perfect. The saut√©ed vegetables were incredibly flavorful. We are happy and can only recommend Ubay Seafood.

I visited Trincomalee after 3 years. I stayed at Ubay Guest House and tried grilled fish with boiled vegetables. It was perfect and delicious. Dining was in an open area with a garden view in a serene environment with the noise of the sea. I...highly recommend Ubay Guest for the stay if you visit Trincomalee and try grilled seafo highly recommend Ubay Guest for the stay if you visit Trincomalee and try grilled seafood.

DO NOT waste your time and money by coming to this place!!! Do not let the positive reviews fool you.

How on earth could this be the #1 restaurant on Tripadvisor for Trincomalee...

The waiter could barely understand a thing we said and did not...show any enthusiasm or kindness. The tables were not set. The food took forever (more than 1.5 hour...) to prepare while there were only 5 other persons in the restaurant. Everyone was  wondering how long it was going to take.

The pasta was overdone, sticky and they forgot the shrimp. After 5 minutes, the waiter brought 6 shrimps on a plate. They were greasy and cooked but that was all.

You could think: okay, ordering pasta in Sri Lanka is at your own risk. But they even messed up the fish curry (Sri Lankan cuisine)... Tasted also like it was made with instant powdered stuff, very salty. And the fish tasted not fresh and was 10 times overcooked, really really dry. Even the papadum was not good: very greasy and I could bend the thing because it was not properly fried.  

We tried the food because we were that hungry but after a few bites we gave up. It was not a possibility to tell the waiter we did not like the food at all because he did not understand a thing we said. Out of good manner, we just paid him and left. 

How can our experience be the opposite of all the super positive revie show any enthusiasm or kindness. The tables were not set. The food took forever (more than 1.5 hour...) to prepare while there were only 5 other persons in the restaurant. Everyone was  wondering how long it was going to take.

Convenient spot for dining and the food was delicious! All dishes were at very reasonable prices. One of the fussy eaters in the family also really enjoyed the kotthu roti. They also accept credit cards with a small surcharge but it was useful for us.

Who would have guessed ... my son‚Äôs first comment after tasting the sauce accompanying his chicken curry; ‚ÄúThis is the best curry I‚Äôve had so far in Sri Lanka, it‚Äôs lovely spicy but not burning‚Äù.

My wife and I had the‚ÄòTodays Special, which was Jumbo...Prawns with garlic and ginger and the owners special homemade secret sauce.

If you're looking for delicious food, well...you must go to UbayRestaurant.
We visited many restaurants but nothing to compare to it!The owner is so kind and the food we ate here was the best we've ever tried in Sri Lanka!
The fish was always fresh...and super high quality. Prices are good and the location is so peaceful! As Italian I really appreciate the taste of everything cooked here! Super recommend. Wonderful casual and comfortable outdoor restaurant with fresh seafood prepared as you like. Diverse menu beyond the seafood offerings. Very kind and friendly service. Inexpensive. I would definitely return.

while furniture maybe should need some updates, our dinner was simply ...superb.
dopo piatti inconsistenti, piccanti e senza gusto, questo posto rende onore al palato!
sorry for Italian comment, but we are a bit obsessed by food...

The seafood was amazing, it's levelled up my seafood palette for sure. Was very accomadating and even ordered in some beers for us upon request.  He's a 1-man-band so may have to wait a little but its definitely worth the wait.

One of the best cafes in terms of food quality and its price! The friendly host will tell you about any questions! When we arrived at night in Trincomalee, the booked hotels did not open their doors to us and refused to book at all,...we called here and the owner arranged accommodation for a normal price everything was clean, the air conditioner was new, there were many more establishments and a store 500 m near we called here and the owner arranged accommodation for a normal price everything was clean, the air conditioner was new, there were many more establishments and a store 500 m nearby.

The jumbo prawns are not from this universe!!

They took our number and sent us pictures of the freshly caught lobster, and told us price straight up. It was...very reasonable. Once at the restaurant the Lobster was prepared and it was stunning. Paul Is a really great cooker: Always fresh fish for a really good price. He also tried to help me with all my requests. Very good treatment and very good Person! Go there!!
Very delicious food (especially tom yum and deviled fish). Hostile stuff. Highly recommend you this wonderful place.

This restaurant has rightfully such high ratings. I tried the curry and the shrimps and were both exceptional. The people are also fantastic. When I told them that I was going to be late, they told me that they will cook for me something nevertheless....Highly recommended for the food and the politeness of the people running the pla Highly recommended for the food and the politeness of the people running the place.
Very friendly owners who served us an amazing fresh tuna steak (we could inspect the prime pieces of meat before they were grilled) at a very affordable price.

Everything was just perfect! From the service to the delicious and fresh fish. 
Best meal we could ask forin Trincomalee! Also the owners are nice and friendly

Had a lovely meal here with my wife while in Trinco. this place is a lovely family run restaurant which adds to the experience. The food was really good and I would highly recommend getting any seafood here because of how fresh it is. Absolutley awful!!! Over priced, food was inedible. Hands down the worst dining experience of my life.

We got the seafood platter and it was delicious! So fresh! This place is run by a lovely family. Great service :) definitely recommend

I‚Äôm an individual tourist guide. I brought my guests to this restaurant a few times and I got really great recommendations from my clients. The food is really delicious. They always try to give the maximum quality. No artificial flavor added. Reasonable prices. Maximum attention...on the customers.I would definitely recommend here to the other guides to take their gue on the customers.I would definitely recommend here to the other guides to take their guests
Fresh seafood, good price, great staff and good chef. Best restaurant in Uppuveli so far. We came here 4 out of 6 nights..
We were for four times, it's a very good restaurant, fresh fish and very good souces. The family is very friendly. Very good place in Trincomalee!!!

Had a great fish platter here. Reasonably priced and all home cooked by the family.
Highly recommended and worth a visit.
We were looking for seafood last night and we entered in the perfect place. Amazing food and service
We spent in Trincomalee one week and this was the best restaurant what we visited. Delicious and everything fresh. Try seafood plate for two or seafood soup. We reccomend that!

We went to tuna restaurant for lunchtime after a snorkeling trip and it was awesome. The food is so great, we ate fried rice chicken and pineapple, tuna and a vegetable toffu and it was one of our best meals of our trip. The personel...is also lovely and provide a great service.
We recommend to anyone this place and might come aga is also lovely and provide a great service.
We recommend to anyone this place and might come again.
Food, hospitality and atmosphere make this a place to visit. Also have own generator for when the power cuts off

Good and tasty devilled prawns. Noodles a bit  boring - I'd go for something else. Milkshakes and Mango Lassi were fab - super tasty. Fresh fish looked amazing - next time would have that. Will go back.

This cooking class was really really nice! 
We started at 12:30 pm. First, we went to the shops together to buy the ingredients for the meals. 
Then we started cooking. We did two different types of Dhaal curry, two different types of egg plant curries,...Devil fish curry, pumpking curry and coconut sambol. They explained everything in detail and we could write everything down. Also they showed us some tricks to make the cutting of vegetables easier. We also cut vegetables etc. on our own.
We always tried the meals before to see if we have to add some spices etc. 
After cooking, we ate the meals! It was more than delicious!
Thank you so much for this experience. It was great

Take your time and walk or ride to this restaurant because it will definetly be worth it. The waiter really makes you feel at home with his kindness and it is clear he take great value in your satisfaction.  A large menu with good prices...make it difficult to choose but we would recommend the sizzling prawns, the best seafood in all of Sri Lanka! This is an awesome find very close to the beach and tellingly populated by locals of the area - always a good sign and the food did not disappoint! Thanks very much
One amazing place for seafood. Quite generous with their portions as well. Friendly staff and good music. A must visit if you are in Nilaveli.

Just about midway on beach road Nilaveli is Sana's Place seafood restaurant. They have lobsters and all other seafood where  we can choose them fresh and get them grilled and is served in sizzlers with French fries and fresh veg salad  they prepare 6an authentic...sauce which combines so well with the seafood and is really is delicious. They also have a pub and happy hours from 7pm to 8pm. Great grooves and reggae music with  friendly staff. If you go to Nilaveli you must visit them...especially during happy hours.
They also cater vegetarian and vegan menu. Ku sauce which combines so well with the seafood and is really is delicious. They also have a pub and happy hours from 7pm to 8pm. Great grooves and reggae music with  friendly staff. If you go to Nilaveli you must visit them...especially during happy hours.
They also cater vegetarian and vegan menu. Kudos

There was a huge surprise for us when we have looked for some lunch in Nilaveli. We were lucky because we stopped by Sana place and had a excellent lunch contains local absolutely fresh sea food plate(crab, fish, calamari, prawns) and it was delicious! Highly...recomend this restaurant to all. Please follow us and enjoy very warm service and excellent fo recomend this restaurant to all. Please follow us and enjoy very warm service and excellent food.

We stayed at the restaurant for more than three ours, just eating and drinking delicious juices. Very nice vibes, great chilled music, the staff is very friendly and the food was good. Definitely recommended to go here.
Very nice seafood in Nilaveli beach. Super friendly staff and reasonable place. We had grilled crab and it was very tasty!
Nilaweli best seafood restaurant. We really enjoyed with seafood at Sana place. Very good service, kind staff, nice atmosphere. We had cheaper cocktail as well.

We really enjoyed the fresh seafood and the good and relaxing atmosphere. The owner also gave us lots of tips for our travel without pressuring us.

We will come back!
Thanks a lot for delicious meals! One of the best foods which we had on our Sri lankas trip! Recommend!

We had a meal at Sana Place en route to our hotel, finding it completely by accident. The most wonderful seafood pasta!
We liked it so much we went back two nights later to celebrate my birthday. Very quiet due to repercussions of Covid and...the season not yet being underway. But a fantastic evening. Great service from Sana and Nishantha and delicious food. And thanks for the music and dancing, Nishantha. Skorpions ru the season not yet being underway. But a fantastic evening. Great service from Sana and Nishantha and delicious food. And thanks for the music and dancing, Nishantha. Skorpions rule!
Very nice place close to the beach. The food was very tasty and fresh. The host is very friendly and helpful.
Very excellent,  delicious and colourful food prepared with fantasy. Wonderful and friendly host with cute little son. We really  enjoyed :)))
The deviled fish is amazing! I ate here four times and everything was good! The owner is a very nice guy
Got the grilled carb, it's was perfect!freshly cught in Trincomalee.best restaurant, delicious food and good everionemet.they're serving high quality foods.

We had the most delicious banana pancakes for breakfast here. Apparently it is under new management, but everyone we met was really lovely and friendly. The chef came and chatted to us to check we were happy and was a lovely and interesting man. Thanks!

The restaurant, along with most others, was empty. We were upsold to what sounded like some lovely grilled fish, about three times the prices of normal seafood mains on the menu. The way it was sold, it sounded like we‚Äôd have a feast, so we...went for it. What we got was an okay medium sized piece of fish, a few nicely grilled prawns and barely any chips. We left hungry and feeling like we‚Äôd overpaid. Would not recommend at all when compared to what is on offer at other restaurants around. I think they were a bit desperate so trying to milk the few customers they g went for it. What we got was an okay medium sized piece of fish, a few nicely grilled prawns and barely any chips. We had for dinner The seafood drum.both including fish,cuttlefish, Crab & Prawns . everything very fresh and tasty and sarvice exceptional is very nice. Highly recommended! !!!

It was a disastrous experience of a very well advertised seafood delicacies, arrived in tiny quantities most items were not even served. At last said they are not available . Highly misleading propaganda on the website.
Highly recommend and the food was yummy excellent staff really good. We had calamari, devilled prawns verry good food for berry good price keep it up great job
It was an great placed good food recommending. the seafood is verry nice. go and have a nice time  the staff is so frenly......
I've visited several seafood resturants in this area and seafood drum has the fastest service, friendly staff and fresh seafoods for the reasonable price.. highly recommend..

We had lunch here on a hot afternoon after a morning snorkelling, and the food really hot the spot! Delicious papaya juices, and the owner provided lime slices to squeeze in. 
My partner's fried rice was nicely enhanced by some chili paste, and the owner...was more than happy to explain how this delicious paste is made.
My veggie curry was wonderfully spicy.
Staff friendly and helpful without being intrusive, and happy for us to stay on after eating to finish our crossword before venturing back out into the he was more than happy to explain how this delicious paste is made.
My veggie curry was wonderfully spicy.
Staff friendly and helpful without being intrusive, and happy for us to stay on after eating to finish our crossword before venturing back out into the heat.

Stopped for a quick bite on a hot Sunday afternoon.  Warmly welcomed to a table directly under ceiling fans....phew! Following delicious papaya juice (with lime) I had a very good fried rice with excellent chilli paste on the side. My wife had the vegi curry...yum....The staff were very friendly.  Well worth a vis The staff were very friendly.  Well worth a visit.
The seafood drum has very nice sri lankan food. As a vegeterian you can have very good vegetable Rice and Curry and the staff is over the top friendly and helpful. Very fast wifi as well!
It was value for money. Good staff and  Very good service and we enjoyed very much. Good location I like the seafood  (grill fish and salads) also good music
Me and my family really enjoy with sea food dishes  it was very tasty awesome. Very friendly staff. I recommend this place because you can have nice time when you enter

An excellent little place with great food and lovely staff but with no online presence (yet!). Instead of just eating at aqua inn or somewhere similar, venture 100m inland to this cracking place for a very well priced, filling and tasty lunch/dinner and you won't...regret  regret it.
Great atmosphere, lovely staff and food was delicious - would recommend the kottu! Definitely come here if you're in uppuveli!
Just visited the seafood drum, friendly atmosphere, great food, very reasonable priced . Recommended
